author: oheger
msg: This is an implementation of the EventListenerProvider interface providing a
convenient API to define the event listeners of a configuration builder.
Instances of this class can be passed to a builder's configure() method.

author: oheger
msg: This is a special parameters interface for initializing a configuration
builder with information about event listener registrations.

author: oheger
msg: Because the methods in configuration builders now have the same return values
as the corresponding event source methods, no conversion of return values is
